metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1615 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low.
metadata.Description:
In Samba, GnuTLS gnutls_rnd() can fail and give predictable random values.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1615` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ldb-tools - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu1
libldb2 - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu1
python3-ldb - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu1
No subscription required

ctdb - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu1
libnss-winbind - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu1
libpam-winbind - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu1
libsmbclient - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu1
libwbclient0 - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu1
python3-samba - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu1
registry-tools - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu1
samba - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu1
samba-ad-dc - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu1
samba-ad-provision - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu1
samba-common - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu1
samba-common-bin - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu1
samba-dsdb-modules - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu1
samba-libs - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu1
samba-testsuite - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu1
samba-vfs-modules - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu1
smbclient - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu1
winbind - 2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> Upstream Samba project did not publish updates for stable releases below 4.17.x

criterions.comment: samba package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:4.17.3+dfsg-3ubuntu1').
